Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.javascript

This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for the javascript language.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeAbstractJavaScriptExpressionAnalyzer A base class for javascript expression analyzers.
AeAbstractJavaScriptExpressionParser Base class for JavaScript implementations of an Expression Parser.
AeAbstractJavaScriptParseResult A base class for javascript parse results.
AeBPWSJavaScriptExpressionAnalyzer A concrete implementation of an expression analyzer for JavaScript (BPEL 1.1).
AeBPWSJavaScriptExpressionParser A BPEL 1.1 JavaScript implementation of an expression parse.
AeBPWSJavaScriptParseResult A concrete BPEL 1.1 implementation of a parse result for the javascript language.
AeJavaScriptParseUtil A helper class that contains some static methods for parsing JavaScript expressions.
AeWSBPELJavaScriptExpressionAnalyzer A concrete implementation of an expression analyzer for JavaScript (BPEL 2.0).
AeWSBPELJavaScriptExpressionParser A BPEL 2.0 JavaScript implementation of an expression parse.
AeWSBPELJavaScriptParseResult A concrete BPEL 2.0 implementation of a parse result for the javascript language.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.javascript Description

This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for the javascript language. The JavaScript language implementation used is Rhino (http://www.mozilla.org/rhino/).
